full_description:
ASUS ZenBook 14 UM425UA Ryzen 5 5500U 14" FHD Laptop

The incredibly compact, thin, and light ZenBook 14 features AMD Ryzen 5000 Series Mobile Processors for powerful all-round performance, and includes HDMI, USB-C, and USB Type-A ports, and a microSD card reader for unrivaled versatility. With its beautifully crafted classic design and travel-friendly features, ZenBook 14 will make your on-the-go lifestyle more effortless than ever. The compact, light, and thin all-metal design of ZenBook 14 makes it the ideal traveling companion. It is also one of the world's thinnest 14-inch laptops to feature a full set of I/O ports including full-size HDMI and USB Type-A so you can enjoy versatile connectivity wherever you are. With ZenBook 14's amazing battery life, traveling without a charger isn't a big deal. When you do need to top up, its fast-charge feature can restore the battery to a 60% charge level in just 49 minutes, so you'll be ready to go in no time. The compact and elegant ZenBook 14 is supremely light, so it's an indispensable traveling companion. Wherever you go, its outstanding performance and convenient features will help you work more efficiently and let your inspiration flow. Pine Grey is a glossy shade that is calm and peaceful. It projects professional wisdom and features a special off-center version of the iconic ZenBook spun-metal finish. The four-sided NanoEdge FHD display gives you stunningly clear and bright visuals. The slim bezels create a 90% screen-to-body ratio, delivering an outstandingly immersive viewing experience. There is also an amazing optional low-power 1-watt display that combines maximum battery life with 400-nit brightness. ZenBook 14 redefines what is possible in an ultrathin laptop. It gives you a full complement of I/O ports, including full-size HDMI, USB Type-A, and USB-C. There is also a microSD card reader for easy data transfers from your mobile device. ZenBook 14 looks stunning, with a new edge-to-edge ergonomic keyboard design that allows more comfortable typing. With Windows Hello and the integrated infrared (IR) camera, password-free face login is fast and easy, even in dim lighting conditions. ZenBook 14 has a precision-engineered ErgoLift hinge that automatically lifts the rear of the laptop slightly when it opens, tilting the keyboard to the optimum typing angle. This action also raises the chassis for optimized cooling and enhanced audio quality. Performance is a crucial part of the ZenBook experience. ZenBook 14 is powered by AMD Ryzen 500Series Mobile Processors that deliver ultrafast responsiveness even for demanding tasks. ZenBook 14 also features a fast PCIe 3.0 x2 SSD and the latest WiFi 56 (802.11ax) for superb all-around performance. ZenBook 14 has been tested to meet the ultra-demanding MIL-STD-810G U.S. military standard for reliability and durability. Tests consisted of a punishing regime designed to ensure survival in harsh environments and included power-on drop tests and operations at extremes of altitude and temperature. ZenBook 14 has also passed ASUS laptop stress tests that far exceed the standards set by the industry. It comes with 2 years International Limited Warranty (Battery 1 year).

Asus ZenBook 14 UM3402YA Ryzen 7 5825U 14" WQXGA Laptop

The Asus ZenBook 14 UM3402YA is a high-performance laptop that offers a compelling blend of power, portability, and stunning visuals. Powered by the AMD Ryzen 7 5825U processor, this laptop provides exceptional computing capabilities, with a base clock speed of 2.00GHz that can turbo boost up to an impressive 4.50GHz. Its 16MB L3 cache ensures smooth multitasking and responsive performance. The ZenBook 14 is equipped with 16GB of LPDDR4X RAM, which is soldered onto the motherboard for faster data access and energy efficiency. The 512GB M.2 NVMe PCIe G3 SSD offers lightning-fast data transfer speeds, ensuring rapid application loading and file access. Security is a top priority with the inclusion of TPM (Trusted Platform Module) for hardware-level encryption and enhanced security. Plus, the laptop features an illuminated keyboard with a built-in fingerprint sensor, providing convenient and secure login options. The visual experience on the ZenBook 14 is truly remarkable. Its 14.0-inch WQXGA (2560x1600) IPS-level panel with anti-glare coating delivers crisp and vibrant visuals. With a 16:10 aspect ratio, 100% sRGB color coverage, and an impressive 400 nits of brightness, you can enjoy immersive content creation and entertainment with stunning clarity and color accuracy. The laptop boasts a 90% screen-to-body ratio, minimizing bezels for an expansive and distraction-free viewing experience. The ZenBook 14 features AMD Radeon Graphics. This ensures smooth graphics rendering for tasks like photo editing, video playback, and casual gaming. Connectivity is a breeze with the inclusion of Wi-Fi 6E, providing faster and more stable wireless connections, especially in crowded environments. The laptop also comes with a CMOS HD webcam for clear video conferencing and online communication. The Asus ZenBook 14 UM3402YA is a versatile laptop that combines a powerful AMD processor, ample RAM and storage, exceptional display quality, and robust security features, making it a top choice for professionals, content creators, and anyone seeking a premium computing experience. Whether you're working on demanding tasks or enjoying multimedia content, this laptop delivers on all fronts.

Asus ZenBook S 13 OLED UX5304VA Core i7 13th Gen 13.3" 3K Laptop

The Asus ZenBook S 13 OLED UX5304VA is a stunning and powerful laptop designed for users who demand both style and performance. With its sleek and elegant design, impressive hardware specifications, and advanced features, it's poised to enhance your computing experience in various ways. The laptop is powered by the 13th generation Intel Core i7-1355U processor. With a base clock speed of 3.70 GHz and the ability to turbo boost up to 5.00 GHz, this processor delivers exceptional processing power for smooth multitasking, demanding applications, and more. Equipped with 16GB of LPDDR5 RAM, the ZenBook S 13 ensures efficient performance and responsive multitasking. This high-speed memory enables you to seamlessly switch between applications and handle resource-intensive tasks without any slowdown. The laptop boasts a spacious 1TB SSD (Solid State Drive) for storage. SSDs offer lightning-fast data access speeds, improving overall system responsiveness and reducing loading times for applications and files. The 13.3" 3K OLED display is a visual treat, featuring a resolution of 2880 x 1800 pixels. The OLED technology ensures deep blacks, vibrant colors, and excellent contrast. With a rapid response time of 0.2ms, it's perfect for both creative tasks like photo and video editing, as well as enjoying high-quality media content. The laptop features integrated Intel Iris Xe Graphics, providing capable graphics performance for everyday tasks, light gaming, and media consumption. While not suited for high-end gaming, it ensures a smooth visual experience for most applications. The ZenBook S 13 includes a backlit keyboard, making it easy to work in low-light environments. The tactile feedback and well-spaced keys contribute to a comfortable typing experience. The Asus ZenBook S 13 OLED UX5304VA is a premium laptop that combines a sleek design, powerful hardware, and impressive display technology to cater to various user needs. Whether you're a professional, a creative enthusiast, or someone who appreciates high-quality visuals, this laptop has the specifications to deliver a top-notch computing experience. From its lightning-fast processor to its stunning OLED display, it's a versatile device that's ready to handle a wide range of tasks with style and efficiency.

full_description:
ASUS Zenbook Pro 14 Duo OLED UX8402ZE-M3050W Core i7 12th Gen RTX 3050 Ti 4GB Graphics 14.5" 2.8K Touch Laptop

The ASUS Zenbook Pro 14 Duo OLED UX8402ZE is a high-performance laptop featuring a 12th Gen Intel Core i7 processor and an OLED display. The laptop features a dual-screen design, with a 14-inch OLED touchscreen primary display and a 12.6-inch touchscreen secondary display, which can be used for multi-tasking or as a virtual keyboard and touchpad. The OLED display offers deep blacks and vibrant colors, making it ideal for video and photo editing, and other creative tasks. Other notable features include a lightweight and slim design, fast storage and memory, and a full-size backlit keyboard. It's a perfect choice for professionals and power users who demand the best in performance and display quality.

Powerful Processor and Graphics Capabilities

The ASUS Zenbook Pro 14 Duo OLED UX8402ZE is powered by an Intel Core i7-12700H Processor with a base clock speed of 2.3 GHz and a maximum turbo frequency of 4.7 GHz. The processor has 6 physical cores and 8 threads. This laptop comes with NVIDIA GeForce RTX 3050 Ti Laptop GPU with 4GB of GDDR6 VRAM. It also features Intel Iris Xe graphics. This Core i7 Laptop comes with 16GB of LPDDR5 memory on board. It also comes with 512GB of M.2 NVMe PCIe 4.0 Performance SSD storage. The Laptop does not have any expansion slots or the capability to upgrade the memory.

Experience the Vibrant and Immersive Display

ASUS Zenbook Pro 14 Duo OLED UX8402ZE has a 14.5-inch OLED touchscreen display with a resolution of 2.8K (2880 x 1800) and an aspect ratio of 16:10. The display has a 0.2ms response time and a 120Hz refresh rate, which allows for smooth and fluid visuals. The display of this OLED Laptop is also VESA CERTIFIED Display HDR True Black 500 which means it has a peak brightness of 550 nits and a contrast ratio of 1,000,000:1, providing a high dynamic range viewing experience. The color gamut of the display is 100% DCI-P3, which means it can display a wide range of colors. The display is also PANTONE Validated, ensuring accurate and consistent color reproduction. The display has a screen-to-body ratio of 93%. It also has a low blue light feature which reduces the amount of harmful blue light by 70% and SGS Eye Care Display. ASUS Zenbook Pro 14 Duo OLED UX8402ZE features a ScreenPad Plus, a 12.7-inch IPS-level panel with a resolution of 2880 x 864 that supports stylus input.

Connectivity and Security

The ASUS Zenbook Pro 14 Duo OLED UX8402ZE comes equipped with a 720p HD front-facing camera for video conferencing and streaming. It also comes with onboard wireless connectivity options, including Wi-Fi 6E (802.11ax) and Bluetooth 5.0. In terms of I/O ports, this laptop includes 1x USB 3.2 Gen 2 Type-A, 2x Thunderbolt 4 ports that support display and power delivery, 1x HDMI 2.1, 1x 3.5mm combo audio jack, 1x DC-in, and a Micro SD Express 7.1 card reader for easy data transfer and storage expansion.

High-quality Audio

The ASUS Zenbook Pro 14 Duo OLED UX8402ZE is equipped with advanced audio features, including Smart Amp technology that enhances the performance of the built-in speakers, as well as a built-in array microphone that enables clear communication during video calls and recordings. The Laptop also features premium Harman/Kardon speakers for an immersive audio experience. Additionally, it has support for voice control through Cortana and Alexa, which allow users to control the device and access information using voice commands.

Design and Durability

The ASUS Zenbook Pro 14 Duo OLED UX8402ZE is powered by a 76WHrs, 4S1P, 4-cell Li-ion battery and comes with a ø6.0, 180W AC adapter with an output of 20V DC, 9A and 180W. The input voltage is 100~240V AC and 50/60Hz, making it a universal adapter. This Premium Laptop has a backlit chiclet keyboard. The LCD cover is made of aluminum and is in Tech Black color. The top case is made of Magnesium-Aluminum Alloy and is also in Tech Black color. It is built to meet US MIL-STD 810H military-grade standards, ensuring its durability and resistance to extreme conditions.

Asus Zenbook Pro 14 OLED UX6404VV Core i9 13th Gen RTX 4060 8GB Graphics 14.5" OLED 120Hz Touch Laptop

The Asus Zenbook Pro 14 OLED UX6404VV Touch Laptop is a powerful and premium laptop that can handle your gaming and creative needs. This laptop has a 13th-generation Intel Core i9-13900H processor at a base frequency of 2.6 GHz and boosts up to 5.4 GHz. It also has 16GB of DDR5 memory, which can support your multitasking and gaming needs. It also has a 1TB M.2 NVMe PCIe Gen4 SSD that provides fast and ample storage space for your files, programs, and games. The Asus Zenbook Pro 14 OLED UX6404VV laptop also has an Nvidia GeForce RTX 4060 8GB GDDR6 graphics card for smooth graphics performance for your games and other creative applications. It also has a 14.5-inch 2.8K OLED touchscreen, which can display vivid and immersive visuals with a resolution of 2880 x 1800 pixels and a 16:10 aspect ratio. It also has a 120Hz refresh rate, which can provide fluid and responsive gameplay and animation. It also has a 0.2 ms response time to reduce motion blur and ghosting. They also have a 400-nit brightness and a 550-nit HDR peak brightness that enhance the contrast and color accuracy of the display. The Asus Zenbook Pro 14 OLED UX6404VV core i9 13th generation Touch laptop features an FHD camera with an IR function, which can support Windows Hello facial recognition for easy and secure login. It also has a Wi-Fi 6E and Bluetooth 5.3 wireless card, which can provide fast and stable wireless connectivity and data transfer. The Asus Zenbook series laptop has various I/O ports, such as USB-A, USB-C, Thunderbolt 4, HDMI 2.1, audio jack, DC-in, and SD card reader, to help you connect your devices and peripherals easily and quickly. The Asus laptop also has a durable and stylish design, with a US MIL-STD 810H military-grade standard that can withstand various environmental conditions and impacts.

full_description:
ASUS Zenbook Pro 14 Duo OLED UX8402ZA-M3031W Core i7 12th Gen 14.5" 2.8K Touch Laptop

The ASUS Zenbook Pro 14 Duo OLED UX8402ZA is a high-performance laptop featuring a 12th Gen Intel Core i7 processor and an OLED display. The laptop features a dual-screen design, with a 14-inch OLED touchscreen primary display and a 12.6-inch touchscreen secondary display, which can be used for multi-tasking or as a virtual keyboard and touchpad. The OLED display offers deep blacks and vibrant colors, making it ideal for video and photo editing, and other creative tasks. Other notable features include a lightweight and slim design, fast storage and memory, and a full-size backlit keyboard. It's a perfect choice for professionals and power users who demand the best in performance and display quality.

Powerful Processor and Performance

The ASUS Zenbook Pro 14 Duo OLED UX8402ZA is powered by an Intel Core i7-12700H Processor with a base clock speed of 2.3 GHz and a maximum turbo frequency of 4.7 GHz. The processor has 6 physical cores and 8 threads. This laptop comes with Intel Iris Xe graphics. This Core i7 Laptop comes with 16GB of LPDDR5 memory on board. It also comes with 1TB of M.2 NVMe PCIe 4.0 Performance SSD storage. The Laptop does not have any expansion slots or the capability to upgrade the memory.

Experience the Vibrant and Immersive Display

ASUS Zenbook Pro 14 Duo OLED UX8402ZA has a 14.5-inch OLED touchscreen display with a resolution of 2.8K (2880 x 1800) and an aspect ratio of 16:10. The display has a 0.2ms response time and a 120Hz refresh rate, which allows for smooth and fluid visuals. The display of this OLED Laptop is also VESA CERTIFIED Display HDR True Black 500 which means it has a peak brightness of 550 nits and a contrast ratio of 1,000,000:1, providing a high dynamic range viewing experience. The color gamut of the display is 100% DCI-P3, which means it can display a wide range of colors. The display is also PANTONE Validated, ensuring accurate and consistent color reproduction. The display has a screen-to-body ratio of 93%. It also has a low blue light feature which reduces the amount of harmful blue light by 70% and SGS Eye Care Display. ASUS Zenbook Pro 14 Duo OLED UX8402ZA features a ScreenPad Plus, a 12.7-inch IPS-level panel with a resolution of 2880 x 864 that supports stylus input.

Connectivity and Security

The ASUS Zenbook Pro 14 Duo OLED UX8402ZA comes equipped with a 720p HD front-facing camera for video conferencing and streaming. It also comes with onboard wireless connectivity options, including Wi-Fi 6E (802.11ax) and Bluetooth 5.0. In terms of I/O ports, this laptop includes 1x USB 3.2 Gen 2 Type-A, 2x Thunderbolt 4 ports that support display and power delivery, 1x HDMI 2.1, 1x 3.5mm combo audio jack, 1x DC-in, and a Micro SD Express 7.1 card reader for easy data transfer and storage expansion.

High-quality Audio

The ASUS Zenbook Pro 14 Duo OLED UX8402ZA is equipped with advanced audio features, including Smart Amp technology that enhances the performance of the built-in speakers, as well as a built-in array microphone that enables clear communication during video calls and recordings. The Laptop also features premium Harman/Kardon speakers for an immersive audio experience. Additionally, it has support for voice control through Cortana and Alexa, which allow users to control the device and access information using voice commands.

Design and Durability

The ASUS Zenbook Pro 14 Duo OLED UX8402ZA is powered by a 76WHrs, 4S1P, 4-cell Li-ion battery and comes with a ø6.0, 150W AC adapter with an output of 20V DC, 9A and 150W. The input voltage is 100~240V AC and 50/60Hz, making it a universal adapter. This Premium Laptop has a backlit chiclet keyboard. The LCD cover is made of aluminum and is in Tech Black color. The top case is made of Magnesium-Aluminum Alloy and is also in Tech Black color. It is built to meet US MIL-STD 810H military-grade standards, ensuring its durability and resistance to extreme conditions.

full_description:
Asus ZenBook 14X OLED UX5401EA Core i7 11th Gen 14" 2.8K OLED Touch Laptop

The Brand new Asus ZenBook 14X OLED UX5401EA Core i7 11th Gen Touch Laptop is a slim, light, and compact laptop. It is designed with a bright 16:10 NanoEdge slim-bezel IPS-level display. It is powered by the latest Intel Core i7-1165G7 (12M Cache, 2.80 GHz up to 4.70 GHz, with IPU), 16GB LPDDR4X RAM, 512GB M.2 NVMe PCIe 3.0 G4 SSD, and Intel Iris Xe Graphics, which deliver superb performance with ASUS Intelligent Performance Technology. The Zenbook 14X gives all the performance you need for smooth multitasking and effortless productivity. Ultrafast PCIe 4.0 x4 SSD storage and gigabit-class Intel WiFi 6 (802.11ax) mean you won't be waiting for apps or websites to load, either. In this Zenbook, the ASUS IceCool Plus technology ensures maximum performance whenever you need it. The Zenbook 14X Weighing only 1.4 kg7 and measuring a slim 15.9 mm, Zenbook 14X is supremely portable and versatile. And its comprehensive I/O ports mean you can connect to anything you want, wherever you are. Its 180° lay-flat ErgoLift hinge makes it easy to collaborate, and for easy data entry, there's the ASUS NumberPad 2.08 that integrates a full-size LED-illuminated numeric keypad into the touchpad. There is secure fingerprint login, too, with a handy sensor on the power button. The Zenbook 14X comes with all the I/O ports you need for easy connectivity to your devices and peripherals. The latest ultrafast Thunderbolt 4 USB-C ports support fast charging, 4K UHD external displays, and up to 40 Gbps data transfers, and there is also an HDMI port and a USB 3.2 Gen 2 Type-A port alongside a microSD card reader. Communications and audio I/O are also taken care of by the convenient audio combo jack. Zenbook 14X has a stereo sound system certified by the audio experts at Harman Kardon, for unrivaled audio quality, This Asus Zenbook 14X also delivers powerful, immersive sound that is crystal-clear, giving you superbly immersive entertainment and communications. The precision-engineered 180° ErgoLift hinge makes sharing content easy, and the innovative ASUS NumberPad 2.0 enhances your on-the-go productivity. Let Zenbook 14X light up your work or play, anywhere. This stylish Asus ZenBook 14X OLED UX5401EA Core i7 11th Gen Touch Laptop comes with 02 years International Limited Warranty (Battery 1 year).
